thread.section_title: ProofreadingPal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProofreadingPal.com | proofreadingpal.com
thread.title: tim kincaid

author: tim kincaid
title: tim kincaid
text: I discovered ProofreadingPal.com about 2 1/2 years ago and have used their service a dozen or more times -- proposals, presentations, and marketing pieces. The price is fair. Their timeliness and consistency are exceptional. And besides commas and spelling, their recommendations on word choice and sentence structure are greatly appreciated. Fair to say, they make this marketing guy look good.
